name: Secret World Legends

task.app: corefonts vcrun2015 d3dcompiler_43 d3dx11_43 d3dx9_43 win10
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- client: https://web-cdn.funcom.com/downloads/swl/SecretWorldLegendsMin.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: null
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts vcrun2015 d3dcompiler_43 d3dx11_43 d3dx9_43 win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /S
    description: Installing client
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: '0'
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
